But if you are like me, and already have devices that have the smart features you desire, this TV should meet your needs. I would recommend buying additional speakers, but for an apartment the ones in it work ok.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Autumn Sorenson
Reviews.Content: Great TV I would buy it again and again :)  I have had it for a year now and not one issue.

Reviews.Title: excellent product, excelente equipo
Reviews.Author: rafael surga
Reviews.Content: The TV works correctly. the power saving function is a success. The only point I see is that I can not play by USB wmv format movies.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen C. Smith "Chosen by God"
Reviews.Content: Very nice looking..... outstanding picture, good sound quality, great price. My son has an LG and he recommended it, I could get into all the finer points but I do not think that's necessary. There are some bad TV's out there, this is not one of them

Reviews.Title: Good tv with some problems
Reviews.Author: Michael Miller
Reviews.Content: This tv, by all accounts, is a good one, especially for the price, but there is one major problem: when there is a darkly lit scene in a movie, the screen will try to figure out whether it should be brighter or darker, which results in the screens brightness kind of going brighter then darker, off and on, etc. If you are into High quality definition and TRUE BLACKS, THEN THIS MAY NOT BE FOR YOU.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Television
Reviews.Author: Patrick M
Reviews.Content: I received this Television as a gift back in Christmas 2011 and it has been great ever since. I have had no problems what so ever. The color quality is amazing. There are so many options available to tweak the quality and color of the television that it makes this television ideal for true movie fanatics or gamers like myself. I don't plan on upgrading my television any time soon, This was a great investment and highly recommend LG as it has the highest quality when purchasing electronic products.Side Note: I also own a 22inch LG Computer Monitor for 3 years+ and haven't looked back.. LG is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: monticet
Reviews.Content: We purchased  this TV for our bedroom.  It's hanging on the wall.  It has good sound quality (although we are not sound experts...) and the picture it great.  Shipping was very quick.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV.
Reviews.Author: Bombay Bob
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought each other flat screen TVs for Christmas last year -- one for our main house and one for our vacation home.  I bought this TV for a brightly lighted living room where I watch mostly sports.  The LCD screen and the 120mHz refresh rate make it perfect for that.  I love this TV and would buy another.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: MyrBeach1
Reviews.Content: I saw this TV on the wall at Best Buy and it stood out against all of the rest.  The picture is amazing and the sound is pretty good for not being hooked up to a surround sound home theater.  The picture can be changed to 8 types and the sound can be changed too.  It has a sleep timer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Judson Roberts
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace a Dell plasma TV, that was an energy hog and had developed burn-in ghosts in its screen. I've used this LG for over a year now, and love it. It's easy to hook up, has a beautiful picture, and--unlike the old plasma unit--gives off no heat, and the screen doesn't develop ghosts. A tip--don't waste money paying for the "smart" upgraded version. We bought the less expensive "dumb" model TV, and a "smart" LG Blu-ray player. All the "smart" feature does is--sometimes, but not always--automatically switch the TV's input selector to whatever input device is live.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: goofy
Reviews.Content: this tv was much more affordable  than in local stores I ended up being able to buy this bigger tv for less money & I really am enjoying it

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Melody Danson"
Reviews.Content: This TV is so lovely. If it was a SMART tv, it would be perfect but my budget wouldn't stretch that far. The picture quality is a bit soft for normal-definition tv but when you use a HD channel or watch a blu-ray, this TV really comes into its own. Picture is crisp, tight, and colour is very true. No motion blur at all. Very easy to set up, doesn't need much fussing about, and very reliable. My second LG TV, and I'll be coming back again.

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: gary warasky
Reviews.Content: Love this Tv,great picture and sound., clear and bright color so great its like being there right in the tv. great buy

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Rex4Lex
Reviews.Content: We bought this last year for Christmas 2011.  I read several reviews of TVs before purchasing.  I was nervous about setting it up and getting the correct sound and picture.  I had no trouble at all.  We have a great HD picture and have been happy so far (and it's a year out).  I would purchase another LG product.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV!
Reviews.Author: Sam Lungren
Reviews.Content: I got this TV 1 year ago for Christmas 2011. It has been nothing but amazing! I love that it swivels on its stand but yet still sits sturdy and solid. I had read several reviews about problems with the sound but have found nothing at all to be wrong with the sound. I have it hooked up to my surround sound speakers anyway so its all good. But even without surround sound speakers it has great sound. My family has loved watching movies and football games on this TV. I love that it has an HDMI port in the back. (It has more than 1 actually.) I often will plug in my laptop to show a youtube video or some other movie or video. Its better to huddle around the 55inch TV rather than the 17inch computer monitor! I hope it lasts many more years!

Reviews.Title: LG excellent
Reviews.Author: Bugs
Reviews.Content: Made the jump to flat screen and hit a home run with this TV.  Excellent product and quality.  Couldn't be happier.  Shipping and handling excellent.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: WandaRosa
Reviews.Content: i have for a year now and its a great tv. i love the picture of this tv.  i love it

Reviews.Title: The only reason this review didn't get 5 Stars, - The sound.
Reviews.Author: alisha brisson
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a year ago.  Still going strong!  The 120HZ is perfect for a 42" size TV.  The deep blacks and crisp edges on HD for TV, video games and blu-ray rival any TV. The sound on the TV is weak. The picture and sound quality are equally important to me.  Any TV you buy, the sound will not be up to par with the visual quality.  I live in an apt. I bought a LG sound bar with wireless subwoofer on Ebay - Sound problem solved.  The sound and picture are more than I expected for a first time HDTV owner.  LG is the Best!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Stephen A. Means "big_slacker"
Reviews.Content: We got this as a replacement for a TV that movers broke. The price is very good, the quality is as well. Two really big pros with this TV:#1-The menu system and controls are very easy to use, especially switching inputs.#2-Sound quality is surprisingly good for built in speakers. You're not gonna replace a home theater but they're head and shoulders above typical flat panel TV sound.It's not ultra high end, but I feel the value for the $$ is high.

Reviews.Title: LG 55-Inch LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Albert A Gangl
Reviews.Content: Love it.  It works very well.  I watch it 18 hours per day.  I had a 42 inch LG and wanted a bigger one as I have some eye problems.  No problem watching this BEAUTIFUL set now.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Keith D.
Reviews.Content: This is the best television I've ever owned!HD Picture is incredible. Sports programs are flawless.Would buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: No complaints whatsoever.
Reviews.Author: Gifford Kucsma
Reviews.Content: I'm always leery of buying something like this via mail order, but this TV met all of my expectations.  In fact, I was surprised and pleased to find that it had a USB port into which I could plug memory sticks with videos that I'd saved on my computer.Setup was no problem whatsoever.  Dealing with the cable company to get them to activate the HD service was a hassle.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: wluffman
Reviews.Content: We have had this for about 7 months now and have had no issues with it whatsoever!!! I love the way it looks with blueray video and with HD sports!!!

Reviews.Title: Decent television
Reviews.Author: D. MacDonald "GameEnthusiast"
Reviews.Content: TV has a decent picture in "full out" mode.  All of the energy saving features on it are a "neat" idea but the practical reality is you'll never ever use them.  The energy usage on "all out mode" is less than our plasma screen but it is not as impressive a difference as you would think.  At least per our Killawatt tester.  The screen is nice for watching sports or action movies.  The picture is nice and clear even with fast movement.  The only thing I really don't like about it is it seems "longer" than most TVs I have owned.  I prefer my plasma screen for most uses but it is a nice TV for our basement.

Reviews.Title: LG TV flat screen
Reviews.Author: Bruce Krider
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV and excellent quality picture.  Should have gotten this particular one a long time ago.. Priced right and works flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: MonM
Reviews.Content: I think this TV is great for its price. Yeah maybe you can get better picture and everything better but for much higher price tag plus there is something coming out new and better everyday. I was looking for something that works great and delivers great picture and sound for on a budget pocket and I got it. Picture is nice and clear with standard TV and looks even better with BlueRay.So if you don't have a lot of money to spend and want nice picture this TV is way to go.

Reviews.Title: Overall - very good
Reviews.Author: Illini Fan
Reviews.Content: For a large cheaper TV this TV is great.  We had the TV hanging in a room with a lot of east facing windows and the only time there was any problems with reflections or glare was early in the morning when the angle of the sun was very low and shining directly on the screen.  There is a little light bleed on the corners on dark scenes but it doesn't seem to bother me when watching my shows so I'm OK with it.  I looked up some calibration settings online and was able to get a very good picture.  I do not like the TruMotion setting as it tends to make everything look like it was shot through a home-video camera.  I turned it off and don't have any problems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV- LG not so much!
Reviews.Author: someone
Reviews.Content: I recently recieved this tv as a repair replacement from LG.  All in all the tv is great!  I am wrighting this review to warn everyone about LG's customer service if a repair is needed.  Our previous tv stopped working after 4 months.  After contacting LG we were promised a quick worry free repair.  THAT DIDN"T HAPPEN.  After 86 days of arguing over our repair we were finally sent a new TV.  They were unable to find a capable repair man to fix the issue.  We were told they would resolve the issue but the only thing they did was pass us off from one person to another at LG. After the fact I looked up LG customer reviews and found that their customer service was horrible.  Don't get me wrong I love our TV but I will never purchase another LG product again simply due to their lack of customer service!  Buyer BEWARE!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: scottshonda
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift for my parents as they would never buy a TV like this for themselves. Assembly and setup was very quick and easy with a basic screwdriver. Once connected to all the right inputs and turned on the initial setup was smooth and quick. Took more time to teach my parents how to use it than to set it up. Picture quality is good, sound is good except when there is ambient noise in the room, then it needs to be turned up a little more than expected.Overall this was a very good choice for the money and quality.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: shopperqueen
Reviews.Content: Purchased LG42LK520 at Amazon in  November, 2011.  Teenagers set it up in a flash and it has been wonderful.  The LCD picture is much clearer than a relatives LED V----.  The sound is just fine-and my hearing is not the best.  I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Basic HD TV
Reviews.Author: athira
Reviews.Content: I am a technologically handicapped person, so I'm not sure of the technicalities involved. But the tv was an instant hit at my house. My husband is glued to it. It was little too big for our apartment, but we plan to shift so if you place it at a 6 feet+ viewing disatnce, that would be nice. The sound is good, we keep it in movie mode. My husband alters the viewing modes while switching between movies and sports. The clarity for sports is great. And the movie quality cant complain. We wanted to get a Samsung initially, but opted for LG because of the pricing. But we are absoultely happy with our decision. I cant tell a difference honestly.  Its just a basic HD TV. No frills, no smart stuff. We have Wii so we play a lot on that and stream Netflix movies.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: jmejia
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a t.v for a reasonable price that was at least 42" that was from an electronics company that was known for quality. I didn't wanna settle for a t.v that made me feel later that I had wasted my money. I wanted the specs to be good, at least 1080P. I  found everything I was looking for in this t.v. Great Buy.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Katfan
Reviews.Content: Great tvNo problems so far.  Make sure to off the energ saver to compare picture brightnessPicture size and keeping all image in proper aspect ratio can be an issueWould recommend

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: NCBuckeye
Reviews.Content: I chose this TV because I had previously purchased a 32 inch LG that I was very happy with. This TV is just as good.  The picture and sound quality are both fine.  I have not had the first problem with it.  I am neither a gamer nor someone who needs to have all the latest high tech gadgets as soon as they come out. I simply want to watch my favorite programs - mostly sports - and the occasional dvd movie.  This TV serves that purpose very well. Additionally, Amazon offered the best price of all the places I researched.  Along with that, the company they used to deliver the TV was superb.  The gentleman who brought it was very friendly.  He carried it into my home, removed it from the packaging, hooked it up to the cable box and dvd player and waited through the initial setup to make sure everything worked correctly.  I would definitely recommend this TV and Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely amazing
Reviews.Author: Samir
Reviews.Content: I'm a college student with a part time job and I needed a new tv for gaming but everything was too expensive and the quality was crap. I found this tv and with 24 months financing with no interest I was sold. The quality is amazing sound is beautiful and setup is easy. This tv is abosultly worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: L. Goodman
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived on time. So far I have been very happy with it. Very easy to hook up only took minutes. The picture quality is very good. A great value for the price. I would purchase this product again. I would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Sibille Brohammer "Bille"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome product for the price...It was easy to set up and the picture is beautiful and crisp.

Reviews.Title: LOVE ME SOME LG
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Byers
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd and largest LG TV in our home.  The menu, though very elaborate, is easy to maneuver through and decipher.  The picture is excellent.  For the price, this is a terrific value.

Reviews.Title: LG Television
Reviews.Author: Clifton Wike "Cliff"
Reviews.Content: This television was as it was prsented, I has a very clear picture and sound.  Very pleased. It was received ahead of the promised date.

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: G. Dow
Reviews.Content: After weeks of searching the internet, I found that the LG 42 inch flat screen TV met all the requirements that I wanted and Amazon offered the best price and easy delivery right to our home in just a few days.  So far, WE LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Before and After
Reviews.Author: IndianaNative
Reviews.Content: I received delivery of this HD television a few weeks ago and set it up using my old digital cable convertor box and old cables until I could obtain a HD convertor box from my cable company.  I was disappointed in the picture quality and lack of good sound compared to my old Sony 1080 (non HD) television. There were also problems with the size of pictures on various channels.Before leaving on a scheduled trip, I took the advice of others who have posted here and ordered the Mediabridge HDMI cables.  After returning home, I received my new HD convertor box and installed it using the Mediabridge HDMI cables. The difference was absolutely amazing!  The picture quality and colors are life-like and the sound level needed dropped substantially (from 28 to 14).  Also, the picture size on all channels now completely fills the screen on all channels.I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase of this HD television.  For the price and picture quality, you can't go wrong with this HD television.

Reviews.Title: perfect Tv
Reviews.Author: kb
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture and lots of possibilities. What i love most about this Tv is that you can put movies on thumb/external hard-drives as long as it's in the right format and you can plug it in to the Tv and watch it directly without hooking up a computer or go through another device.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: Barry Kahn
Reviews.Content: I've only had it a month, so my review is very short-term.Easy set-up, great picture and sound.I had purchased another TV a few years ago, and AMAZON delivery included un-crating and checking that the set worked.This time, it was just dropped off like any other AMAZON package.The times they are a'changing?

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Grandma
Reviews.Content: I needed a larger screen TV as my vision has deteriorated and the larger lettering allows me to more easily read all printed information on the screen.  The picture is excellent and I could not be more pleased with the delivery and unpacking that accompanied the delivery.  I give this company  5 stars and would award more if possible.  I look forward to doing business with Amazon in the near future.  GOOD JOB

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Will S.
Reviews.Content: I've been using this TV for the last 4 months and love it! Great picture, good sound, and easy menu. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: LA to Hobbs
Reviews.Content: product is great. can't go wrong with this brand. trust me i'm one of those people who spend countless hours researching

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: yomom63
Reviews.Content: Came on time and works great. It is what you expect for a LG TV. This is the second LG we have bought through Amazon

Reviews.Title: Not nice but GREAT TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Graf "ybo"
Reviews.Content: I've been shopping around for a big HD TV for a long time and  have read many reviews and done a lot of research before I decided to buy this LG.  I have no experience with LG, but from the reviews of this TV and others seems they make a good product that the majority of people like.  The only catch I found on this model was that it had a bad internal antenna!  Hey, if you are going to spend around a grand for a TV spring for cable or satellite!!I'm not quite sold on 3D. I think it's still a little early to drop another grand on one of them.  I bought a blue ray that has internet connection so didn't care that this is not a `smart' TV.  So it met my needs.Amazon delivered the TV quickly and best of all....free!  Most places I checked it was $60 plus to just deliver it.I had the TV installed and hung on the wall using Amazon's Service Valet.  That by the way was a quick and easy phone call to setup.  I will review them separately.  To me that is the only way to really appreciate these big screens.  Not to say the stand looked cheap, I thought it looked OK just don't want to chance it getting hit and then falling over.  Secure on the wall is the only way to go.  The guys who installed it had only nice things to say about LG which made me feel more secure with my purchase.With book in had I sat and played around with the settings.  I thought the zoom controls were fun if you want to turn the picture bigger or fill the screen.  It did this with surprisingly little picture loss, but I normally have it just sense the picture size.  So most standard TV shows just fill up the middle, but I'm fine with that.I have satellite, and a coaxial cable so the picture is not perfect, but with some tweaking on the very interactive controls this TV has I was able to get an OK picture.  On HD channels it is very clear and lives up to its HD name.  By the way, the controls are good.  I do advise to watch the DVD that comes with the TV.  It explains the settings much better than the book.  The first thing I did was turn the power settings off.  The TV gets WAAAY too dark with them on, no matter the light in the room.I have a big picture window opposite it, and the glare is minimal.  This TV has a nice matt screen, but the frame is glossy.  I think the thing is beautiful!  The cute little LG logo only adds to its charm.It has the volume, on and off on one side, and an RCA cable, HDMI and head phones hookup and USB port to hook your PC on the other side.  I have yet to use this, but looks easy and am looking forward to using my PC or a USB drive on it.  Since it is in on the wall it is very hard to get to the back of the TV so I am grateful for the hookups on the side.  The guys who installed it hooked up the HDMI cable to the back for my DVD player, but I will need help taking the TV off the mount to do anything in the back.  For now that's fine since all I have hooked to it is the DVD blue ray.To get my legacy stereo to work on it, I have to use the head phone jack using a Y cord (which you get on Amazon for less than a buck!)  It works like a charm, but you don't need it unless you are a snob about it (admittedly I am!!) The TV had nice sound with lots of controls to it.I only took 1 star off because of the things it lacks, like internet that others may want, but if you have blue ray or game box that has it, there really isn't a need for it.  Also unless you watch the DVD it can be a challenge to setup, but these are small things that you have with any TV.I do recommend this TV if you can find it.  It's under a grand now.  If you have ever had any questions about getting a TV on a website, Amazon is the way to go.  No hassles and good service and I figure I saved well over $100 in delivery and tax!  Just go to the stores and fine one you want then order through Amazon.  You will NOT be disappointed!!

Reviews.Title: couldn't be more pleased
Reviews.Author: Sarah Parsons "Sarah Parsons"
Reviews.Content: We've been using this TV since January, and it arrived in perfect condition and we have had no problems.  The picture is very clear and the configuration is easy to adjust, remote easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Al N
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. The picture quality is outstanding on the standard(home)brightness setting. It was purchased to replace a 40 inch Sony Bravia LCD bedroom TV. The 47 inch LG not only weighs significantly less so I could utilize the original wall mount, but requires half the power, so it won't heat up the room as the Sony did. It doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles (internet connectivity, 3D, etc) of some of the new sets, but for the money it is a lot of TV.

Reviews.Title: LG TV with great service to back it up.
Reviews.Author: Kranki
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV after reading all the great reviews. Ordered at 2:00 pm and it arrived the next day early in the day for $3.99 shipping.  Makes me wonder how some sellers on Ebay charge so much. Back to the TV.  Unpacked, changed bracket from my Sharp TV, used the same power cord and hung it on the wall.  10 minute job at best.  Went through the set up and WOW!!! Nice picture and just in time to watch golf.  Had a "Dirty Screen" problem the next morning at 5:30 and contacted LG via email.  They responded very quickly and solved my problem.  Does anyone really read the instuctions?  Problem solved and it's a great TV and rest assured I'll be looking into other LG products in the future.  Did I mention that LG service contacted me on Saturday.  Is that normal?  Very happy with the total transaction through Amazon.  I'm a big fan. I'm 71 years old and have trouble walking for a long time.  Shopping from my Florida room makes it easy.  Thanks Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised!
Reviews.Author: tooslow
Reviews.Content: I set my new TV up, last night; pretty simple.The picture and sound are fine.Issues are minor, I suppose;A)No front mounted headphone jack!B)A TOSLINK connector to hook up the external sound? Ugh.I have a cable but I'll need a converter or a new receiver.C)No sleep button directly on the remote; have to cycle into 'quick menu'.Other than that... I agree; fine TV.Watched a basketball game for a few minutes before sleep; BIG GRIN!

Reviews.Title: Love My LG 42LK520 LCD TV...
Reviews.Author: Joseph Donaher
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on Amazon.com for my bedroom. I was looking for a decent TV but did not care if I got the bells and whistles.  I wanted to mount on the wall at the head of the bed and did not want to have to put on my glasses to see the menu.  Price was a driving factor with picture quality as a must.  Sound had to be good but did not need surround sound for bedroom watching.I was between a Vizio 42" and the LG 42".  I could not be more happy with my purchase.  Out of the box the picture was ok and sound was mediocre but after playing with the setting for 10 minutes both sound and picture are awesume...  I did end up turning off alot of the features like energy star setting and trumotion but I am very pleased with my purchase.  This TV is so light that I purchased a single stud TV mount for $31 on amazon which tilts, pivots, and spins which completed the package.  This is my second TV purchased on Amazon and would not hesitate to do again.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: George H. Young
Reviews.Content: It has only been a month but so far it's has turned out to be an excellent deal.  The picture is great and the price was very good

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture, but we're already having problems with the sound!!
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: We've owned this TV for just a little over 2 weeks and tonight my husband couldn't even hear the TV unless he cranked it up to 80.  Then there was an annoying humming/buzzing sound at that high number.  We called customer service and they are sending out a technician to have a look to see what could be wrong.  We loved the TV, but now am thinking we may have made a mistake in buying it.  I hope we don't continue to have problems. We replaced our old TV, a 137lb clunker, (which continues to work perfectly in our bedroom) with this new model because my husband wanted to experience TV watching on a widescreen.  It was a 75th birthday gift for him. Now if he could only hear what he was watching, he'd be very happy!!  I'll write back after the technician comes and keep you up-to-date on the results.  LG 42LK520 42-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Great Price
Reviews.Author: Vinsanity
Reviews.Content: Originally I was looking at 55-60 inch tv's but once we actually measured the room it was going in I had to tone it down. So not wanting to go all out on a 3d/led/240hz under 50 inches I found this gem.I've had it 2 weeks now and love it. TV looks great (well as great as time warner's hd dvr will let it). Video games and blu-ray are where this really shines though.Mass Effect 3 looks amazing on this set compared to my old one, and the few blu ray movies I tossed at it looked equally as great.3 hdmi's is adequate, (set top box, ps3, 360), I'd prefer to have more available but in all honesty I wouldn't be using them any time soon.Menu's are easy to navigate and the built in color adjustment guide worked well.Sound is sufficient, nothing amazing of course but definitely not bad.Input swapping is very easy, LG gives us a menu with different inputs lit up as on or off to help figure out which input you're looking for. But also takes this one step further by asking if you want to swap to another device when powered on.I bought my sister a smaller LG hdtv about a year ago and its holding up great, I'd definately go back to LG next time I'm looking to buy.For the sub $700 price range I think you'd be hard pressed to find a better deal on a TV this size.

Reviews.Title: LG 42LK520
Reviews.Author: steveg
Reviews.Content: So far, I am pretty happy with this TV. For the price ($570), the picture is decent.PROS:Sufficient ConnectivityGood brightness and contrastCheapCON:My main CON is the durability of the TV mounted on the stand. Even a slight touch makes the entire TV bob back forth. I am not confident that it will stand up to several years of constant adjusting. BEWARE: I would not feel comfortable using this TV on its stand in a living room frequented by small children. I can imagine it being damaged by flying objects/persons.That being said, if you are going to wall mount this TV, you should have nothing to worry about.Another note. I had this problem with two other LG TV's as well. I am connecting this TV to my computer. If you simply set the aspect ratio settings to automatic or 16:9, a small portion of the picture is cut off. In order to correct this, you have to change the settings to "Just Scan". I have no idea why this is the case, but it fixes the problem. I actually sent back a previous LG tv because of this problem. I called customer support, they had no idea what I was talking about, useless.On Amazon's end, shipping was perfect and well protected. Plus, if anything were wrong, Amazon would take the TV back no questions asked. Got to love that.

Reviews.Title: great price .....
Reviews.Author: dyastwutitis
Reviews.Content: my old one gave up... so i bought this for a good price. i dont really have problem with this... i dont really want bright picture..

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Price
Reviews.Author: Psalm 27:4
Reviews.Content: For $699, you can't go wrong with this T.V. The colors are awesome and the sounds are great. If you are looking for a new TV in this price range, get this T.V. If you want the most realistic awesome picture, fork in another 700 and get yourself a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Robin Bird
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase. At first, I didn't like the picture quality, but it turned out to be an older cable box that didn't support high def and not the television. Once we changed the cable box.....wow! Great picture and I am happy with the audio also.

Reviews.Title: Incredible bargain
Reviews.Author: S. Rehahn "Stevie-Ray"
Reviews.Content: Though we've had our LG 47LK520 for less than six months, it has been great for us. The picture quality is as good as a Toshiba that I still own that was well over twice the price, and the sound quality is actually better. I'm hoping this continues for years, but for now consider me a happy LG customer, and of course, Amazon's service was wonderful as usual.

Reviews.Title: LG 55LK520 55-inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Fidel Vigil
Reviews.Content: Delivery company used by Amazon in my area is less than desirable, however the TV is easy to set up, program, and has outstanding picture quality.  Time will tellhow well this TV functions.  Right now, it's a 4.5 Stars.  Always room for improvement.I would definitely purchase this unit.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Darya Ward
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my husband for Valentine's Day - he loves it.  We have another LG HDTV and that is what prompted me to purchase another one.  Easy set up and good quality picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: John J. Thayer "JT"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV after doing a fair amount of research, on a limited budget.  We had purchased a cheaper TV with no luck, so it was returned.  We ordered this and received it within a week.  It was easy to put together and hookup.  There is a slight delay when turning on, and to get sound, but bearable.  Great picture, especially in HD.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Great TV so far, lots of great reviews. Haven't used it for much more than gaming as of yet. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product!
Reviews.Author: Michael Brackman
Reviews.Content: I've had mine for about a month now and so far this TV has been great! The 47 inch size is perfect for my living room. The picture is so clear on HD channels that it looks as if you could almost touch whatever is being shown. There are plenty of inputs for DVD, VCR, PS3 and even one for PC(I haven't used, yet). I have nothing I could list as a "con" about this TV, it's all good!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Grove girl "Lori D"
Reviews.Content: Picture is great! Set-up was easy, would have liked a way to screw the stand to the table. i did have to turn off the energy saving feature because the picture was too dark. Audio is fine without external speakers. I haven't used the extra features. Overall I am happy with this set.

Reviews.Title: amazing!!!!
Reviews.Author: barbara porter
Reviews.Content: This is my first non-tube tv so am getting used to it.  So different but has a beautiful picture.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture!
Reviews.Author: S. Mose
Reviews.Content: We are amazed at the clarity of this picture!  When watching movies, it is like the actors are right in front of you!  Great tv!

Reviews.Title: Best christmas present to myself....EVER.
Reviews.Author: Brad Turner
Reviews.Content: This tv has been awesome. I spent a month reading all the negative reviews of the TV's I was interested in. This was the one with the least amount of consistent problem reviews. The only complaints I noticed was that people said it had bad sound. I've noticed that it depends on what movie you watch. I put in one movie and I have to jack the sound up to 52, another movie had me with the sound at 12. I really think its the movies not the TV, but even if it was the TV I really wouldn't care. The picture is great, the sound is great, I use this for blu-rays, gaming (both ps3 and laptop connected by HDMI cable), and I would recommend this TV for anyone on a budget. 42 inches is well more than most people need to be honest.

Reviews.Title: Rough start, perfect finish
Reviews.Author: Timothy S. Corcoran
Reviews.Content: When I first received the TV, it would not turn on (had slow flashing red band lower right side of outside rim of screen). There was no obvious damage to the package and I personally took it from the shipper. Called LG support and answered by a human within 2 rings once I got through the usual phone tree. I received very competent advice and after a short troubleshooting exercise, LG determined it needed service. The first available LG technician appointment for in-home service was in 3 days. LG technician came and replaced the only 2 boards on the TV- the power board and mainboard. Both looked perfect to the naked eye but after replacement, the TV started normally. It has a beautiful picture. Like everyone else, I disabled the energy saving feature which caused the screen to be too dark. Overall, I am very pleased and glad I purchased the set despite the initial glitch. I did purchase a 3 year warranty form SquareTrade but had made this decision before receiving the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Brian James Nienaber "brian_nienaber"
Reviews.Content: This tv has worked great for me and worked right out of the box.  I highly recommend it if you are looking for quality and value.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV!
Reviews.Author: Katherine B.
Reviews.Content: Full disclosure, I do not know anything about the technology behind television sets and what makes one better than another. But I can say for any "lay people" that are looking for a nice TV for your family room, this is a fantastic one. You have to take it off energy saver mode or else the screen dims down after a certain amount of time, but once we figured that out, it's been great. It was very easy to set up as well.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: jddemattos
Reviews.Content: Picked this up to replace our 4 year old Samsung that started turning itself off. The picture is superb. I really liked the picture wizard for getting the image quality adjusted. Sound is adequate - no worse than the many other models I have watched at other's houses. For the price, it was an excellent deal and I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: LG 47LK520 LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: L. Hall
Reviews.Content: After deciding that we needed a new flatscreen for the living room, I did a little homework on HDTVs. After seriously considering the Sony Bravia line, I finally noticed this model at our local Walmart. It was every bit as clear and vibrant as the Sony, but much more inexpensive. The 47-inch size is perfect for the small (12 to 16 foot) viewing distance. The sound without the home theater is passable, but nothing spectacular. It is an attractive unit, and assembles easily.After noticing that there was a sizable price difference between the Walmart.com online price, and the Walmart instore price (the in store was much more expensive), I checked Amazon. I've never ordered anything this expensive online before, but I have had positive experiences with Amazon returns in the past, and for the $100 + price difference, I was willing to take a chance. The tv was delivered even faster than expected, and the company that delivered it was extremely courteous.The only disappointment was with the LG remotes. I have a LG BluRay home theater with Simplink, and have found that both remotes are incredibly slow. Once you push a button, you have to wait a second or two or three to get a response. Annoying, but not fatal.All in all, the picture clarity is great, the colors are vibrant, and there are enough inputs to hook everything into the tv. I love it.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: L. Martin
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy - great price, great tv.  It doesn't have any frills, but great if your main goal is a great picture and sound.  I took the suggestions from other reviews and changed the brightness, sharpness, etc. and it really made a big difference.  One thing I didn't realize prior to purchasing a 42-inch is viewing should be at least 6 or 7 feet for the best quality.  Probably not an issue for most people, but when you're in a small apartment, it is.  Still love it though - a definite recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: M. Lowery
Reviews.Content: Replaced my Vizio with an this LG after researching numerous models.  All functions worked right out of the box.  Set-up was a breeze but I am a retired electronics tech so it might take a bit longer for others.  Picture was fantastic.  Was happy with my Vizio but it was only a 32".  ONe of the first features I really like is the 120 hz motion setting, no more blurring of action sports.  Another big thing with the LG was there was no need for a sound bar as there was with the Vizio.  I don't know if Vizio has addressed that with their newer models or not but the sound of the LG was plenty loud and clear, not tinny at all.  Another factor was price here at Amazon.  Unbeatable compared to other outlets such as Walmart, Best Buy, etc.  Have had the set for 4 months now and overall evaluation is 5 stars.  I also purchased the extended warranty as it was less expensive than having to deal with replacement hassles.Do yourself a favor and get this LG, you'll be glad you did !!!!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Bbox87
Reviews.Content: Purchased this beauty to replace a little 22 in insignia, and boy does this thing shine. The 150,000 to 1 ratio is fantastic. The colors are extremely vibrant. The 120 hz is something I wasn't to familiar with but read somw reviews, and decided to go with it, considering I play quite a bit of xbox. I will never go back to 60 hz again. Battlefield 3 is UNBELIEVABLE as well as Gears of War 3. Although the t.v. does take about a half hor or so to warm up to 120, it is WELL worth it. Overall I was looking for a bigger t.v., and got a bigger, brighter, masterpeice. I did a TON of research on t.v's about two months in advance, and the lk520 had the best reviews for the money. DEFINATELY recommend.

Reviews.Title: I just stole my new 47"HDTV from LG! Please don't call the police...
Reviews.Author: Tim "Snapple"
Reviews.Content: What can I possibly write that hasn't been written (here) about this awesome HDTV!I read every review here...the reviews were 'spot on'. The picture, beautiful.Hey, before I bought, I shopped around. There are a lot of TV's on the market...I saw some for as high as $4 Thousand dollars to as low as $500.00 (47 inch)...Now, myself, I'm just a simple guy from Chatsworth, I can't tell the difference between a 5 thousand bottle of wine or a bottle of Boones Farm.Simple I tell you...If you want the most'bang for you buck' ... this is the HDTV for you!This baby came to my homevia 'Ontrac' ... I paid $699.00 / Free Shipping & No tax!A Steal!Here's something, obviously you'll want to buy an 'extended' warranty for your new HDVT. My suggested recommendation is not to buy the warranty from / via Amazon, rather...go to the LG website. It's half the price.

Reviews.Title: My Review
Reviews.Author: duckbriggs
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I ever purchased a refurbished item.  A decision I now have 2nd thoughts about.  When the t.v. arrived, there was not power cord, or batteries for the remote control, so I had to wait nearly 2 weeks before I was able to use it.  It's a very nice looking product and plays good.  Unfortunately, within a few days, the screen went dark, but I could still hear the sound, while watching regularly tv programming.  Two days later, it happened again, while watching a DVD.  I had to call it in for servicing.  I am currently waiting for a replacement part.  I would recommend the tv, but only if you buy it new.  I considered purchasing a Vizio, which I could have gotten for a couple hundred dollars less, but decided to keep this and purchase the 4 year (they claim 5, but it's only 4 since it begins the day of purchase, which a one yr warranty already exists for) extended servicing contract with.  So, overall with the money I saved on a refurbished item and purchasing the contract, it works out ok for now.  I have 90 days in which to return it for a refund, so I plan to use it as much as possible, because if something happens again, I will more than likely return it and purchase a new one.

Reviews.Title: excellent TV for price....no frills
Reviews.Author: lenbrick
Reviews.Content: Great TV so far (had it for about a month). Haven't seen any "bleeding" issues yet. Great price. Hope it holds up over time. Amazon 3rd party delivery service was on time and great.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: glenglen
Reviews.Content: tv was easy to set up.  Excellent color saturation.  Not rated 5 stars because it lacks a computer connection.haven't tried usb connection yet but it is likely to work since everything else works.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, Excellent price!
Reviews.Author: raineyj88
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this tv.  Excellent picture.  One thing I recommend is to either turn off or set to minimum/medium the automatic energy saver in picture mode.  It tends to under adjust the picture brilliance as the light varies in the room. Also, it would be nice to have an audio output other than just optical.  But overall, a great tv for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: pyz01 "pyz01"
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a new TV and did not want to spend a huge amount.  This TV had all the features we wanted - for a great price.  Amazon had a special in Jaunary that gave us 10% off - plus the TV was on sale.  This TV was retailing for over $700 and in some stores they wanted just over $800.  Amazon's sale price was great plus the 10% off made for a great deal.The shipping was free - and was done by a professional crew.  No issues at all.  The TV setup was simple - the picture is fantasitic - and the size is perfect - not too big - but big enough to really enjoy.  We really love this TV and would purchase it again.  I recommend this TV for this class and size as probably the best value.  You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: LG47LK520
Reviews.Author: Phantom
Reviews.Content: For the money, a good TV.  Picture is crisp whether watching HDTV or DVDs.  Sound is not bad considering the TV speakers but I hooked it up to a stereo system anyway but for the most part the TV speakers are fine.  Vast improvement over over the 37" Vizio that it replaced (the Vizio lasted only 4 yrs, very disappointing).The LG was very easy to set up and I am happy enough with factory settings and have not felt the need to tweak same.  It was delivered on time from Amazon via FedEx.  I was concerned that there might have been damage considering the method of delivery but everything seems fine.  If there are any issues, they have not surfaced yet...I tried to do the 1 yr warranty registration thing online with LG but their site was down... ended up doing it over the phone.All in, I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice display
Reviews.Content: This is not a "smart TV", and it is not as thin as some more expensive models, but it worked well for over 2 months now. I had to turn "green" feature to minimal, because the display was too dull otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good thus far!
Reviews.Author: Bangah
Reviews.Content: I'll make this short. The TV is awesome. My first LG and the picture quality on the "Sport" setting is good for me. I use my LG for straight internet & streaming and it looks fantastic. The only trouble I had was the HDMI cable. It was an older cable and for the life of me I thought it was the TV but no the old cable. Great TV!

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Wirkus
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time...everything I expected for the price paid...The energy saving setting set from factory is a little too dim to view from an angle...

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: S Miller
Reviews.Content: This TV has the best picture and sound of any TV I've seen under $600.  I purchased the LG 42LV4400 (similarly priced and equiped TV) and sent it right back.  Ordered this one (which cost something like $20 more), and absolutely love it.  The picture quality is great and audio is fine.  After spending weeks looking, I'm glad I ended up with this one!

Reviews.Title: Less is More
Reviews.Author: Rimfire Mountain Man
Reviews.Content: Less is More!  This is a great TV.  Excellent picture and decent sound.  It doesn't do the Internet or 3D but I did not pay for all that stupid stuff I wouldn't use anyway.  I hooked it up to my Direct-TV satellite receiver/recorder with one HDMI cable and started enjoying a great picture in five minutes.  If you want great sound, get a ZVOX 555 speaker base to go with it and you will have the complete package.  It hooks to the TV with one optical (toslink) cable and sounds great.  It doesn't get any simpler then that.  I couldn't be happier with my purchase of this set-up and would definitely recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Lots of cool features and very easy to setup. The picture is clear and sharp. The speakers could be a little larger. I would recomend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture! Nice Features
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This TV is an upgrade from an ancient 27" monster!  It's now actually a pleasant experience to enjoy a movie -- the colors are great, and the size (although small by today's standards) is perfect for family viewing. Also has a good assortment of input/output options.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Thomas Blacker
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I was a little concerned about having the TV shipped by UPS. It arrived in it's original box. I thought they double boxed TVs. Other than that, the performance is what I expected. HD is very clear, and the colors are vibrant. Would strongly recommend for someone who's looking for a moderately priced TV.

Reviews.Title: LG 42LK520 Review
Reviews.Author: DIYer Dave
Reviews.Content: I will not get real technical like some of the other reviews I have read. In a word this is an excellent.  The picture is impressive and the 42 inch screen is very dramatic to me. The set took a couple of minutes to set up to my AT&T; U-Verse box and go through the process of setting the TV to the signal. Instructions were simple to follow and the TV was light compared to my old picture tube set. The remote control is simple to use and works without any problem. The TV is very attractive and looks and feels well made. The only slight issue is that the sound has to be raised really high compared to my old set. This is a minor point. In all an excellent value for what I purchased. My only regret is that I did not do it sooner.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture and great TV
Reviews.Author: Barry Brown
Reviews.Content: Our church bought this TV to put into our Music Suite to play DVDs and present any kinds of media on it, and we are very pleased with it. The picture is excellent, seems to be no lag at all, the screen isn't too reflective, and overall this is the best TV we found for the money. We're always pleased with Amazon's shipping and the way they take care of us with great customer service, so I highly recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: Score !
Reviews.Author: E. Associates
Reviews.Content: LG's 55" @ 1080p is a huge change over 37" RCA used for 10-years (Da). No blurr seen with 120-Hz and high quality picture from side-to-side. Amazon delivered, carried upstairs, unpacked, check for shipment cracks, set up in it's included stand, turned on to verify working = Turnkey (only way to go with large purchases !). They even offered to take away the huge box it came in, but I kept just in case issues in immediate future. The sound from the TV is fine for a medium sized room but I have high ceilings and had already bought a Sony BDV-E570 5.1 Blu-ray Home Home Theater System for this to maximize it's "Theater Presence". LG is a good brand and I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: LG 55LK520 55-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Joseph Vinciguerra Jr.
Reviews.Content: I agree with the good reviews. This TV has a great picture. There are no Smart TV apps, but a Blu-ray player or the Logitech Revue will get you the so called Smart apps to access online. I turned off the Tru-motion because I prefer a TV picture that I was used to seeing via the old Tube TV. My oldest son prefers the animation type movements of people that you get with Tru-Motion turned on. Looks kind of fake and un-natural to me. In the end, you have the option. This TV handles Motion Blur better than the similiar Vizio and Sanyo models. In one review, someone mentioned that a total black scene is not totally black. That is true with my particular set. This can be minimized a little by wiping down the screen with a damp soft cloth. Seems to push out the blotchy white spots a little. At first it bothered me, but for the price and clarity, this TV is tough to beat. One last thing, since this TV is not LED backlit, it is thicker than probably most of your neighbors TV's, but the picture and price were the reasons I chose this over similiar Vizio and Sony models that I was comparing at the time.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: JRB
Reviews.Content: The TV works great. It was easy to set up and the picture is great. It arrived quickly, I hardly had time to use the tracking set up through Amazon. I have made several purchases through Amazon and every one has been a great experience. Would not hesitate to buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: So Happy With this purchase
Reviews.Author: Ryleigh Roo "Gladys"
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this Lg 47" TV.  The picture is great,the sound is great. I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: What a buy!
Reviews.Author: Wolfman
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a new TV for about six weeks and had been checking out different brands. This LG was the best buy for the money. Have had it for 3 weeks and love the picture. No output jacks for surround sound though

Reviews.Title: Great TV, GREAT Price
Reviews.Author: Marilyn
Reviews.Content: It is clear, we love the tv and delivery was so fast.Sound is not its strength but just include speaker a nice sound system will do it. Overall it is excellent

Reviews.Title: great buy!
Reviews.Author: cat
Reviews.Content: amazing clarity and big screen! im using the tv stand and the bottom is kind of wobbly but nothing to complain or worry about and i plan on mounting on wall eventually. picture is perfect, definitely recommend this tv to someone that wants to upgrade!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Lukosik "twistedweather"
Reviews.Content: Viewing experience, Playstation 3 compatibility/experience, and PRICE were my three main concerns when searching for a new television to replace my archaic CRT tv.  After an extended search on the web and reading various reviews on Amazon, I settled on the LG 42LK520.  Two weeks have passed and I have had no problems. This serves as my bedroom televison  with a viewing distance of at least 5ft.Pros- Used Free super shipping... Ordered the tv on a Wed, recieved on a friday. Setup was very easy- picture screen looks excellent, HD 1080dpi is AWESOME!! The detail, vividness, and size adds a new level of viewing, which is very enjoyable.  plus comes with a cloth to clean screen- lots of options in easily navigiable menus- speakers above average, adaquate for a mid sized bedroom- Playstation 3 gaming experience: no problems at all and games in HD look AWESOME!!!- Connectivity: headphone jack, Usb, 3 Hdmi ports, and more.  Hooking up my laptop was a favorite for me.- watching sports  was great, blur and judder was not an issue after adjusting settingsCons-remote very basic, no glow in the dark buttons, reception sensitivity btwn remote->tv could be better, remote sensor located in awkward place-stand wobbly but not flimsyI absolutely reccomend the awesome LG 42LK520!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: alpha13
Reviews.Content: Really great ' mean machine' Great price and delivery by Pilot.Fantastic picture,easy setup... Make sure you click on Input on remote.. And then Hdmi..took me awhile to figure that out...55" LCD is incredible.. And huge. Colors and picture is just amazing!  Even got the Optic audio out to work with my Big sound Denon.. Otherwise you will need a converter for optical to RCA.... Or you can also plug the optical cord directly into your Dvr.Happy camper!By the way, great Amazon price and service.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good value, poor software video playback
Reviews.Author: dk
Reviews.Content: Overall I'm pleased with my purchase.  The picture looks terrific.  However, when the screen is supposed to be all black we typically see backlight shining through -- usually in the upper left area.  Under normal movie viewing, you don't notice it -- but presumably videos would look better with blacker black.I was disappointed with the built-in video playback for attached USB devices.  In particular, the videos aren't scaled to full screen and the TV doesn't recognize video_ts.  I have some DVDs ripped to disk and was hoping the TV would play them like a software DVD player.  It doesn't.  You can navigate into the video_ts folder and start it playing the VOB files, but the picture isn't scaled, so you have a 720 pixel wide image centered on the screen.  Aspect Ratio adjustments are greyed out.  Play the same DVD from a laptop, attaching the TV as an external monitor or play the physical DVD in a DVD player and you get a full-size image.This could and should be fixed with a firmware upgrade.  But this TV has no internet connection, so there's not much chance that LG will provide a fix.

Reviews.Title: Great custom adjustment settings for pictures and colors.
Reviews.Author: Haechi
Reviews.Content: I haven't used LG TV from the Goldstar era of the 80's... but boy~ have thing ever changed since then! From the unboxing, the installation was simple enough and light enough to carry myself to mount it. The TV doesn't have a turn on/off sound so that was a bit weird, but the colors are amazing and so are the 120 Hz fast motions. I played COD on this TV and graphic just comes out way too good to be true. What is best about this product is the way you can customize the color and the picture setting more specifically in your likings without much limits like settings from the other manufacturer. I've got used to the Samsung or Sony menu settings a lot, so dealing with the LG's own set of menus took a bit of time, but after couple of lessons from the manuals and tryouts, it became easy to handle. So this TV can be a great hook up to your computer and for people who looks for a great picture & motion quality in average mid-valued TV.

Reviews.Title: Used in Dorm room
Reviews.Author: PieFtw
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV on sale over the summer and am currently using it in my dorm room. Delivery took a reasonably short time, but we did have to pick it up since no one was home at the time. I have loved owning this TV; it plays Blu-ray discs wonderfully and I have used it on many occasions as a larger monitor to hook my laptop up to for study sessions, Hulu and ESPN3. No gripes about this product as it has plenty of HDMI ports and whatnot. It is a little bit aged, what with all of the LED TVs and Smart TVs out there, but as a student in college I really do not need any of that. Only thing I should really say is that this size of TV is VERY large for a college kid who moves home a few times a year. I probably would have been perfectly happy just buying a thirty-six inch one that I can move on my own.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Basic TV
Reviews.Author: BryanD
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to get a large screen for a large viewing room.  Even though it is LCD technology (vs. LED), I've found the picture to be outstanding.  The on-board sound is very good as well (something that I found NOT to be the case with many of the newer, thinner LED TVs).  The TV does not have onboard Internet functions, but I get these from my attached Blu-Ray player anyway.I think this TV is a real bargain, especially if you don't need the Internet functions and DO need good onboard sound.

Reviews.Title: A QUALIFIED REVIEW
Reviews.Author: CHRIS WERNER
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv to own! I did all my research and look at reviews on amazon and every where else!! I initially wanted to get the 42" LED TV but wasnt gettin the impression that it was a good tv by the reviews and had alot of 5 stars and a number of lowstars.appearence/size:This tv is big! The stand in not that well build so i would recomment getting one of those "tip wires" that screw to the back and to the wall to avoid any falls; just to be on the safe side.  The shiny black plastic id okay too doesnt distract the viewing expereince in any way. The tv just can be moved left and right and not up and down.  The tv has three HDMI ports on the back.This tv is awsome and worth the money! It is clear and has a sharp image and I have it connected to my xbox 360 and first played call of duty modern warfare 3 and i was so loving the experience of the tv.  The speakers areent all that loud but then again neither are most LED or LCD tv's. I also bought the HDMI cables (Mediabridge Ultra Series - High Speed HDMI Cable with Ethernet - (10 Feet) - Category 2 Certified - Supports 3D & Audio Return Channel [Latest HDMI Version Available]" and they worked so good and the picture at 1080p just had me staring at the tv, cables are a must get from media bridge and were a GREAT! price.  I turned off the energy saver cause it seemed to go dim on me at times and love it with the energy saver mode off.dislikes: sound from speakers not that loud and the stand is shakey, and menus are kinda weak lookinALL IN ALL, I am a shop around and doin my reviews type person and for the money and size, this is a great buy and you wont be disappointed!!!p.s. I also bought the LG SMART TV UPGRADER ST 600 MEDIA STREAMER FOR NETFLIX AND WORKS GREAT AS WELL! (ONLY USE HDMI CABLES)

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRICE
Reviews.Author: nancy childers "N.C."
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my new TV. Great price and free shipping, what more could one ask for? Did I mention no tax. I'm a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Crisp, clear, beautiful
Reviews.Author: charisse
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv at a good price. TV shows, movies, cartoons all look crisp and clear. I have my PS3 connected to it through a HDMI cable and games look crisp and clear. Watching sports like football there is no blur. I do recommended this TV, I own a 42" Vizio 120hz 1080p which i like, and i had bought a 46" Toshiba 120hz 1080p which was horrible and returned it and purchased this one.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with LG TVs
Reviews.Author: plc
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV one month ago to use in our living room. We have been very pleased.  The picture and sound are both very nice.  We have absolutely no complaints.  This is the second LG flat screen tv we now own.  The other is a 32 inch model and we would highly recommend them both.

Reviews.Title: LG 42 inch 120hz tv
Reviews.Author: chefqueen
Reviews.Content: Love it.Easy to set up. I plugged it in and was ready to go. Would recommend this tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: R Fox
Reviews.Content: Our first HD TV and we are loving it.  The colors are vibrant and the picture is very sharp.  We are totally enjoying watching this new set.  My husband is also enjoying the football games in HD.  This was definitely a good purchase for us.  Our son has an LG TV and highly recommended this brand to us.  We are glad we took his recommendation.  I would recommend this product as well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Legend9Nine
Reviews.Content: I did much research before I settled for this TV. The picture is beautiful, the inputs are easy to get to, the viewing angle is wide, and 3 hdmi and 2 component inputs are quite adequate. The USB connection is an added bonus. This TV can't be beat for the price.

Reviews.Title: lg tv review
Reviews.Author: Bob F.
Reviews.Content: fast delivery. no problem with tv. works great, real happy so far with amazon service. reading reviews is what made up my mind to go with this unit, so far completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: LG 47LK520 47-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Hugh A.
Reviews.Content: Love this model. Very easy to set up. Access to plug-ins connections was well placed. Excellent deal for the cost. Couldn't beat it.

Reviews.Title: LG 55LK520
Reviews.Author: HILLBILLY CYCLE
Reviews.Content: GREAT DEAL FROM AMAZON & GREAT PRODUCT FROM LG...GREAT PICTURE QUALITY, EASY SET UP & LOTS OF FEATURES AND ACCESSORIES

Reviews.Title: LG 42LK520
Reviews.Author: mdrose4
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV, color and picture quality is great, wish it had WI-FI.  The TV arrived in perfect condition, fast delivery.  It was extremely easy to setup.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Jennifer S. Dabal "zenjen"
Reviews.Content: We were replacing an old standard def 36" Sony ( which I just couldn't see anymore) and are very pleased. We don't have satellite or cable and so usually stream instantly from Netflix. The picture quality has been great and we really have no complaints, aside from not being able to figure out how to hook up our ancient Sony receiver for our Bose speaker surround system. Not sure if we'll need to update the receiver yet. Otherwise, we're very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: readingaway
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this TV. Replacing a very old 27" tube TV in our finished basement. Picture is excellent with digital source. Analog TV is OK. Sound is actually better than I expected but I still intend on adding some external speakers or a sound bar at some point. Video games (XBox) look great with no noticeable lag at all. In the absence of any active input, there is some backlight bleeding near the top of the screen but I've never noticed anything once there is an active source signal. As with all larger flatscreens, I'm really concerned about the stand. It installs fine and appears to work OK but it's essentially a 4x4 piece of plastic with 2 screwa holding up 60lbs of TV. No stars off as all TV's are like this. Very pleased, would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: mkelly
Reviews.Content: I had this TV delivered just last week via UPS. It was on time and in good shape. The TV was easy to set up since I have no surround sound system it was 2 simple HDMI connections. I turned it on and popped in a Blu-Ray DVD and I was very impressed with the default picture. I switched over to some HD TV and watched the Hockey game. The picture in my opinion was fantastic. The blurring was greatly reduced by the 120 hrz refresh so you can follow the puck easily. The only things I might complain about is that the sound is not great but It gets the job done. Also the remote needs a firm hand. You have to press the buttons for longer than I'm used to even at close range to get a reaction. It's only been a week but so far I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: A Happy TV Viewer
Reviews.Author: Bob Nacamulli
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV about a month ago and I have been very happy with it. This TV has a great picture, easy set-up and more importantly, my wife who was against getting a flat screen TV has come to really like it. The only thing that I am not happy about is that there is no direct audio-out connection for my home theater set-up. You have to use the headphone jack.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: RMENGFER
Reviews.Content: We have had this t.v. now for just over a month and are extremely satisfied. There were numerous settings that we were able to adjust so everything is to our liking. The picure is very clear and the colors vibrant. Our kids especially like it for their gaming systems. The price was also very reasonable and made us feel like we got an exremely good deal.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Mary A.
Reviews.Content: Images are true, sharp picture and has excellent sound.  I would recommend it to anyone, it gives you a feel of being in a theatre. We love everything about the LG.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: rob rychter
Reviews.Content: I dont buy too many tvs. Read alot of reviews and im glad i made this purchase. Extremely satisfied. Great deal with 24 month financing!! Go Amazon!

Reviews.Title: First time hdtv owner
Reviews.Author: thefunny1
Reviews.Content: This is my first hdtv. Yeah I know I'm way behind on this technology. But I finally took the plunge and ordered the lg 42lk520 model. Let's just say I love it and don't regret buying this tv. I bought this tv for my bedroom. And it lights up the room. The picture is clear and crisp. Such a difference from my old tube tv. It was easy to put together. I didn't need to calibrate too much. Just a tweek here and there and poof I was happy. The sound is loud enough for my room.Amazon/UPS shipping was supurb as usual. The tv was delivered in perfect condition. It arrived on the day it was estimated. I wasn't worried in the least about the shipping. I have never had a problem with them. Btw, this is my first time ordering a large item from Amazon. I am so impressed I am planning on buying the 47 inch version in the next coming months for my living room.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Maxy
Reviews.Content: Great value with excellent picture and easy to use features. Combines well with LG HD-DVR. Set-up went well w/easy to follow instructions.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Don't be afraid to buy this TV. It has an excellent picture with a crisp clear picture and excellent color. I purchased an LG 42LD550 a couple of years ago and love it. This is a similar TV except without the internet NETCAST which I didn't want on this TV. I have read complaints about the sound from this TV. I not sure what they are used to listing to but as far as I concerned the sound is superb!

Reviews.Title: New LG TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Voell
Reviews.Content: I was really concerned about ordering a tv through the mail. It turns out that this was a great idea. The price was amazing and the TV is fantastic. Set up quickly and it did take a little while to get the settings properly on the picture but what a great set that is for sure. Thank you fro this great tv and look forward to my other purchases.

Reviews.Title: Solid Choice for LCD
Reviews.Author: Charlie Shivers "chiva33"
Reviews.Content: This TV is my first foray into HDTV. After researching various options on the web I came across this model series of TVs. Overall, I am very satisfied with the choice and would hands-down purchase this TV again. The picture is great quality, even more most Standard definition viewing. I have mine on attached to the TV stand that came with it. As far as the sound is concerned, I am pretty satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great all-purpose TV
Reviews.Author: Exavion
Reviews.Content: After getting a fairly poor quality Insignia LED (Low response rate made very blurry motion, LED caused backlight bleed) - this TV is a dream come true.  Gaming is great, picture quality is amazing, and very little input lag for my xbox.  Overall a great decision.

Reviews.Title: Happy camper
Reviews.Author: Yukon
Reviews.Content: Product was rated high on comsumer reports. Amazon had the best price of the websites I was willing to purchase from.  Easy purchase, good service, received TV in 2 days with super saver shipping. The tv was selling for less on black friday, used price guarentee and was given credit for difference. TV has great picture and sound. Would recomend the TV and Amazon.com for any purchase you might need.

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS TV!
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: My husband and i love this TV! It's the perfect size and with the 1080p and the 120hz, you can't go wrong. The picture is great. The construction of the tv is great, if feels well built when you pull it out of the box. The delivery was 3 days quicker than what the estimated delivery date said and the box came in perfect condition with absolutely no damage. I would definitely purchase another one! Very happy with it!  :)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: WeekendWarrior
Reviews.Content: There are three things on the wish list:  First, the sound could be better.  I'm not an audiophile, but it's noticeably poor even by my standards.  Second, it could be web-enabled.  In this era of technology, I was surprised it was not.  Last, I wish the stand was not so wobbly as others have said.  It's true I plan to hang it on the wall eventually, so this is not a big deal.  But if I wanted to keep it on the stand, I would not feel safe if I had small kids around.I had to set it up myself despite the "white glove" delivery.  The delivery guy basically pulled one over on me and said it's too cold out to turn it on.  By the time I thought this through, he was gone, but Amazon came through and offered me compensation for this.  Thank you Amazon!That said, this is the best tv for this price.  I love the picture and color.  This is my first HD tv and I'm very impressed.  Even compared to other tvs I looked at, this one is top notch looking.  I'm not an expert on all the specs and what exactly to look for, so in the end I relied on user reviews, and I am not disappointed.  I could complain about a couple other things (like only 3 hdmi and no auto-recognition on these ports) but that would not be doing justice to the tv, which I am very happy with.Overall, I am extremely satisfied, and want to thank all others who write reviews because some people like myself rely upon them.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ed in MD
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase. We had been "stalking" this TV for a while to replace our 60 inch black monster. We are very satisfied with the picture and sound of this TV. Even the 480p from the Satellite looks better than before. From the few games I watched using an OTA antenna, the HD quality is perfect. I hope to enjoy this TV for years to come!

Reviews.Title: Great value, sharp quality
Reviews.Author: Barbie "Hegnela"
Reviews.Content: Finally decided to ditch our old bulky TV and trade up to this LG. I'm loving every minute of it. I wasn't too sure about the size; I thought it was going to take up too much space. But it is just perfect, even for our small living room. It arrived as scheduled in great condition. Set up couldn't have been easier, it's not as heavy as other flat screen TVs and the picture is crisp and smooth.

Reviews.Title: LG 55LK520 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: tahjaye2
Reviews.Content: The item is great for the price, the packaging and delivery was fantastic.  The energy saver is a great option but can be unnecessary at times.My main disappointment with the item is that there is no output except a digital one, I would love to have other output options versus so many inputs.Overall this is a fantastic item and I love it so far....

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price.
Reviews.Author: R L Johnston
Reviews.Content: This television was purchased from Amazon in the Summer of 2011 at the $1,098.00 price (at the time of this review it is $998.00)  with free shipping. It has worked perfectly with anything we hook up to it, from older generation game systems to new generation consoles to computers, DVRs, DVD players, etc. It is heavy, of course, but the foot is steady making us lean away from the wall mount.Fantastic picture and a great buy, especially for right under the thousand mark if it stays.The only con is that the sound isn't perfect, but that could be due to the angle of the screen more than the speakers. (No crackling or interference.) A surround sound system would go great with it.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Peggy A Mosher
Reviews.Content: This TV is just what I was hoping it would be!!!  It has very colorful pictures and very clear !

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PICTURE!
Reviews.Author: lucasfamily
Reviews.Content: my husband and i bought this tv from HSN in january 2011 for around $800.00 but was divided into 6 monthly payments at no extra cost. it was delivered in just a few days and was even better then we thought. we have a large living room and wanted a tv that you would be able to watch from every seat. we only used the stand for a few weeks then bought a high mounted black metal and glass tv stand that we mounted the tv to so we no longer needed the stand.(we stored it)great piture and sound & the remote is sleek. i do think maybe we should have spent a little more and got the wifi able model instead but we have the wifi ready blu-ray player already. we do plan on upgrading to get a surround system by next year to get even better sound quailty out of the tv.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: BFD
Reviews.Content: After extensive research, I settled on this TV purchase over a similar sized LED model. No regrets, this is one of if not the best values for a 55" screen on the market. Not a whole lot of bells and whistles, but if your requirements are simply a big TV with a very good picture, this should work for you. Only negative so far, the sound is sub-par, but that is to be expected with any flat panel TV.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Revan1322
Reviews.Content: The TV is great for how much you pay for it and the size you are getting its more then a great buy but the only reason I am giving it a 4 and not a 5 was because there is a dead pixel on my screen and that's a huge bummer for me. :  *update*!!!! it seems that ... the dead pixel decided to fix its self... this Tv is now moving up to a full 5 stars and i am amazed that it did that! long live LG! lol)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mr. Swain
Reviews.Content: This TV was an excellent value. We purchased a flat screen when they first became popular and she had ran her course. Not only was it time to graduate to a TV that didn't have moments where the screen went completely black but I also wanted a bigger screen. This TV looks great and is not a pain to set up. The colors are very nice. I enjoy the ambient sensor that adjusts the brightness automatically. I read other complaints regarding sitting fairly close to the television but I've not experienced that. Considering the size of the speakers, I think they put out a decent amount of sound. I always hook up the surround sound system to my TVs but even without it on...not bad. We are very happy with it and would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good Intro to a new world
Reviews.Author: Steppingrazor66
Reviews.Content: The LG 42LK520 is my first introduction in the mighty Flat screen LCD world and I have to say that I am very happy with the results. It has everything I need to finally have the video quality I have been craving for, especially since I enjoy movies and play video games. The Wife and I hooked up the HDMI cable and were blown away by the clerity of the picture. It looked just like as if we were watching a documentary.I have not tried it out on video games just yet, but I am very excited to see the subtitles. My previous Television was a 27" Tube TV and everytime something popped on the screen, I had to squint. Which resulted me getting headaches. Well no longer.I also just ordered a cable adaptor for my computer so I can connect to the TV. So when I am in the process of editing a picture, I can have a 42" wide image to play with!

Reviews.Title: lg 55 inch hdtv
Reviews.Author: James D. Clifford
Reviews.Content: Looks just as good if not better than the more pricey tvs of the same size. If you are looking for just the picture in a tv this is it. No fancy internet features, no 3d, not much more than just a damn good picture. Hook it up to a nice stereo system and walla. You got one hell of a home theater. Bought from amazon. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV. Best value as well!!
